title: Join Jamie Roberts and Danny Care for a Rugby World Cup conference call exclusive to Telegraph subscribers
text:
Join England scrum-half Danny Care and Wales centre Jamie Roberts for a conference call - exclusive to Telegraph subscribers - on Thursday 17th October at 4.30pm.

Not yet a subscriber? Join today from only £2 a week - more details on that, and how to sign up, can be found here.

Jamie and Danny will be joined by The Telegraph's award-winning rugby reporters Charlie Morgan and Ben Coles as they look back on a fascinating first four weeks of rugby from the group stages and look ahead to the weekend's quarter finals.

From the performance of the home nations and a look at the pick of the players so far in Japan to their thoughts on the new tackling laws and their predictions for the business end...
description: Join England scrum-half Danny Care and Wales centre Jamie Roberts for a conference call - exclusive to Telegraph subscribers - on Thursday 17th October at 4.
